name: Tetris 2048 Web
description:
-Controls

Left-Right arrows move left-right , up arrow to rotate and down arrow to fall faster.

If yuo are looking for free and funny hyper casula game,your are right place becasuse Tetris 2048 easy,free and funny hyper casula game.   

Funny and well known 2048 game combined with Tetris . This combination collects all loved features of these games. All you need to play this game just merge the blocks which has same numbers inside and swipe or rotate  tetrominos to which side is suitable for it. Pretty easy to play.

-What is Tetris 2048?

Tetris 2048 is a free, easy and casul game for everyone who is looking for time killing games. During your boring time you can spend time with playing Tetris 2048. 

-How Can I Play?

Tetrominoes fall from top side and you can move them left or right wiht left-right arrow keys. When you press up key tetrominoes rotate 90 degree left.  Also,you can  press down key to fall tetrominoes faster.

Each tetrominoes’ cubes have a number. You can merge cubes which have same numbers and  are put up on eachother. 

If you hit or pass top bar, game over. With merging numbers you can continue to playing.

-What Is Cost?

You don’t need to pay any money or watch ads every 2 minutes. 

Pretty easy and free to play. So Let’s play
